properties.site-address: Bank Hall, Bank Hall Drive, Bretherton
properties.notes: Development of the site had not started in April 2017. The conversion of Bank Hall into 12 dwellings is expected to start in the next few months. properties.site-address: The Eagle and Child Hotel, 20 Pall Mall, Chorley
properties.notes: Development of the site had not started in April 2017. This site would then commence following completion of the other site. In either case it is predicted that all of these dwellings will be completed in the five year period..
